LanguageData.TurretWeaponBaseMannable.label: Turret Base M
LanguageData.TurretWeaponBaseMannable.description: A mannable weapon base. This turret comes without a gun. You need to install one, before you can use it.
LanguageData.TurretWeaponBaseAutomatic.label: Turret Base A
LanguageData.TurretWeaponBaseAutomatic.description: An automatic weapon base. This turret comes without a gun. You need to install one, before you can use it.
LanguageData.TurretWeaponBaseAutomatic_Buildable.desc: An automatic weapon base. This turret comes without a gun. You need to install one, before you can use it.
LanguageData.TurretWeaponBaseAutomaticPlasteel.label: Turret Base A MK-II
LanguageData.TurretWeaponBaseAutomaticPlasteel.descri: An automatic weapon base with a light armor plating. This turret comes without a gun. You need to install one, before you can use it.
LanguageData.TurretWeaponBaseAutomaticHighTechTargeti: An automatic weapon base. This turret comes with an high-tech targeting system, but without a gun. You need to install one, before you can use it.
An automatic weapon base. This turret comes with an high-tech targeting system, but without a gun. You need to install one, before you can use it.
